attributes.action: improve health care provision for the people of Northern Lincolnshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Northern (North and North East) Lincs are fed up of having to travel across to Hull and the surrounding area for their long term healthcare. Cancer care and cardiac procedures are 2 areas that the government are championing but their provision to the populace of this area includes a long journey and bridge tolls to get this access.

Scunthorpe and Grimsby (Diana) Hospitals should be able to provide this care rather than the people from this area needing to visit another health authority to get their vital healthcare.
